name: Kill Frenzy
description:
Kill Frenzy - Gunpowder-fuelled, rotting flesh galore!

Kill Frenzy is a game - nay, sport - predicated upon the destruction of all things green and, otherwise, simply previously human. You have a choice of three stages, each packed with their own unique intricacies, as well as multiple weapons to destroy zombies and other yet more nefarious creatures with. You have just 60 seconds to gain as high a score as possible, with said time restraint only being extended via the slaughtering of enemies.

How high can your Kill Frenzy tally go?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Multiple stages!
  • Multiple weapons!
  • Multiple zombie types!
  • Multiple bosses!
  • A race against the clock!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kill Frenzy is compatible with most Windows platforms.

To Install, please follow the following instructions:

  1. Download the file located at [web page location]
  2. Unzip the downloaded file using your preferred file extraction tool.
  3. Open the 'Kill Frenzy.exe' file, located in the newly extracted file.
  4. Choose your preferred settings in the menu prompt.
  5. Click 'Play'!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move the player character.

Left mouse click - Fire your equipped weapon.

Mouse Movement - Rotate the player character.

Keypad 1, 2, 3 - Switch between the pistol, SMG and rifle respectively.

R - Reload your currently equipped weapon.
